product_name: CamelBak Zoid Hydration Snow Pack - 70 fl. oz. - Women's
long_description: Sporting a clean, lift-friendly design, the Zoid hydration pack stores your bare essentials and a whopping 2 liters of water, letting you spend more time on the slopes without fogging up in the lodge.
short_description: Sporting a clean, lift-friendly design, the Zoid hydration pack stores your bare essentials and a whopping 2 liters of water, letting you spend more time on the slopes without fogging up in the lodge.
